Dobra Giera
ля топ

48.7h
고인물게임이지만 술래잡기로 역사가 깊은 게임 뉴비들 끼리면 긴장하면서 할수 있다

=====================================================================

127h

일퀘만 하다보니까 고랭크로 갈수가 없다..  꾸준히 하는것 보면 할만은 한듯
살인마 할때 ㅂㄷㅂㄷ 떨리는건 어쩔수가 없다..
지금 16랭크 17랭크 구간인데 가끔 2랭크 5랭크 잡힐때도 있다
사람이 없는건지 매칭 망겜인지.. 이 부분은 좀 알고싶긴 하다


====================================================================

235h

드디어 빨랭인 4랭크 진입에 성공!!
지금은 생존자만 올렸지만 이제 살인마 랭크도 빨랭 갈 예정
사실 좀 두렵다....
===================================================
824h

호재 토템 나오는 소식 보고 적는 평가
밸런스만 잡으면 진짜 좋은게임인데 밸런스 못잡아서 살인마 다 죽이는 게임
솔직히 리플레이랑 속도계만 넣어줘도 신고 진짜 편할텐데 언제 넣어줄지 모르겠음 핵 잡을 의지가 있는지 모르겠다 진짜

====================================================================================
1066h

다른 업데이트 많은 게임을 사는게 훨씬 도움이 됩니다

난이도는 랜덤으로 잡히는 생존자에 따라 천차만별로 바뀌고
게임이 고착되어 있으면 많은 패치로 게임을 활성화 시켜야 하는데(롤) 전혀 하지도 않으며
핵은 또 얼마나 판치는지 리플레이기능조차 없다(살인마는 무슨 일이 벌어졌는지 알수가 없음)

레이싱 게임마냥 리플레이가 있으면 모르겠다.

생존자의 평균 속도 받는 버프로 인한 속도를 모두 공개해야 한다.

살인마는 정말 궁금한 구간에 뭐가 문제인지 전혀 알수가 없어서 답답해 죽는다

그리고 게임 도중에 이동속도를 살짝 올려 영원히 돌게 하는 핵을 교묘하게 사용하는 유저는 잡을 방법이 없다

리플레이를 만들면 캐치해줄 사람이 수두룩 할텐데 왜 안만드는지 전혀 이해가 안감

after reaching rank 1 i think it's time to review this game. it's bad. you'll spend more time being mad than having fun. whether  you get hit by a huntress hatchet while you're clearly out of her line of sight or get hit by the killer even though you threw a pallet in their face, there is always something to complain about. the glitches and bugs are enough to make even the sanest of men lose their mind. but despite all of that, this is still my go to game. there is something about the eeriness of this game that always draws me back in, even when i say "i'm done with this game for real this time". and if you play it with friends it's actually quite fun. so if you're looking for a game to be mad at and be addicted to at the same time, i highly recommend this game. otherwise, stay far away.

このゲームをプレイするのはやめておいたほうがいいです。
このゲームの問題点
・一部のプレイヤーのモラルがひどい。
煽り行為や暴言チャットなどにストレスを感じないかたはプレイされるといいと思います。
・ゲームを調整している運営の方針が著しくおかしい。
特定の能力が強すぎる、弱すぎるとい方針で調整するのではなく、鬼ごっこでいう逃げる側がフラストレーションを感じるという理由でゲームバランスを調整しています。それによりゲームバランスが崩壊しています。
・対戦におけるマッチングのバランスの悪さ
このゲームにはランク制度があり1から20にクラス分けされています。20から始まり1が上級者です。
ですがランク20の初心者でもランク1～４の上級者と対戦することも多々あります。
大人と子供が腕相撲をするようなものです。当然なにもできす敗北します。

ゲームをしてフラストレーションを貯めたいかたはこのゲームをプレイされるとよろしいと思いますが、そうでないのであれば別のゲームをプレイすることをおすすめします。
過去にこのゲームの開発者インタビューにおいて「追いかける側をプレイするのがストレスがたまる 」という質問に対し「別のゲームをプレイするといい」と回答しているので別のゲームを遊ばれるのがいいかと思います。

Dead By Daylight is an asymmetrical 1v4 Killer V Survivor game. Great game that I thought would die out long ago. Still has an active community that is quite large surprisingly. Common updates and love has been put into this game over the years. It's definitely worth your money and time.

Dead by Daylight - an asymmetrical competitive  1v4 game. For people looking to buy the game: Go ahead and have fun with it as long as you can. As a long-term player I can say that this game has gone through a lot in the past few years, there were good times for both the Killer's and the Survivors' side, there were heavily sided times and now, we got an update which disappointed the majority of the player base. I don't think there has ever been an update so decisive since the removal of pallet vacuums in 2018 and with it the rework of palettes, never has the long-time community been so desparate for the developers to revert an update.

TL:DR
Newer players should get the game and have fun with it (also fun with friends), long-term players like myself on the other hand should reconsider whether they want to support developers like the ones from Behaviour Interactive or not.

EXTREMELY toxic game, beware even if you are a nice player you will still get cussed out and wished death upon. Borderline not worth playing

Edit: This game keeps asking me every two days if id like to edit my review so yeah, 3 weeks later I feel exactly the same if not more correct in my feelings about this game. Ill add that the game play is fun and with a group of nice friends its great but, playing solo you will face a neverending stream of toxicity seen only in games like league, and im not one to get bothered by that shit but after awhile it does get very irritating and turn you off the game. Dosent help that the devs are clueless and do absolutely nothing about anything wrong with the game, bug fixes are slow, balance is questionable, and Dev responses to critisism is flippant and nonchalant. 

So yeah this game is ONLY worth buying if you intend on playing it with some good friends to have fun.

Great game. A few unbalanced perks, but considering it's an asymmetrical multiplayer game, the balance is surprisingly good. All of the tricks and different builds and techs you can do are staggering. There is truly limitless replayability when you play just survivor or just killer. AND you can figure out all the perk builds, techs, powers, tricks, on both killer AND survivor? For just $20? Definitely worth it.

If you have an extremely thick skin for bad balance and rude people then you'll be fine. The game works fine as a party game assuming you don't play with rude people but I can't say that its at all a pleasant experience to play day to day with general matchmaking (which may I add will also pair you up vs people who are simply way better than you). If you play survivor you can either have bad teammates or a bad game where you are the only one to die, otherwise its the easy power role. If you play killer be prepared for a ton of stress if you want to even come close to doing well, you need a lot of game knowledge and in my opinion it is more than what is fair for a game clearly intended for casual play.

If you are the type to like less stressful situations when winding down playing a game then I would suggest you try something else with a better community and balance.
